name: Guidewire
description:
Controls ---------------------------------

Use your mouse to set guidewire connections!

Press "RELEASE" to drop the balls!

Refer to the screenshots if you get stumped on some of them!

--------------------------------------------

Guidewire was made for Trijam 162, with the theme of IT'S ALL CONNECTED!

Use your guidewire to guide balls into exit pipes! Press "RELEASE" once you've configured the wire how you want it!

Remember...only one ball may be used per exit pipe!

Beware! Some levels will contain more than one ball...and sometimes more balls per entrance pipe!

Feedback always welcome, and thanks for playing!     -Manbo
